data.title: NASCAR weekend
data.text: Hardee's is always a good place for us as we don't like a lot of different foods and we know what we'll get at Hardee's when you order.  Not your typical fast food place.  Prices can get a little pricey, depending on what your order, but it will always be fresh.

data.title: New-ish location, SLOWWWW service at drive-thru. OK menu selections, lots of great coupons often.
data.text: Some good burger options, pretty good battered O-rings. Friendly but slow service, with drive-thru ordering broken for many months in spite of being a new store.

data.title: HORRIBLE
data.text:
The girl who took our order (family of 5) was very nice, cook forgot one of our orders, soon as we went back in the car, we checked everything and they forgot to give us one of our fries, went back in and my mom asked for the manager, which was a young girl who looked very unprofessional, and had a bad attitude. Didn't offer to help or anything just stood there checking something (probably her phone). The other cook although said he would give us a refund for all our fries (since they were cold, nice going). 
To anyone who wants to go here PLEASE, check your order! And to the employees who had their phones out, very tacky and unprofessional, just like your "manager" that was on. 
Also, keep the swearing to a minimum.
